scripts.version:patch: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const manifest = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('manifest.json')); const parts = manifest.version.split('.'); parts[2]++; manifest.version = parts.join('.'); fs.writeFileSync('manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2)); console.log('Version bumped to ' + manifest.version);"
scripts.build: npm run format && npm run lint && node build.js
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run version:patch && npm run install:vault
scripts.release:test: docker compose build --no-cache --progress=plain && docker compose run --rm release npx semantic-release --dry-run
